MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Bangor Road and the surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:00PM due to broken equipment on the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 4:00PM. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:05PM on 7th March 2021
